member.name: PRIORITY_HINT
member.summary: Defines values that are used with the structure to specify the priority hint for a file I/O operation.

member.name: PRIORITY_HINT.IoPriorityHintVeryLow
member.summary: The lowest possible priority hint level. The system uses this value for background I/O operations.

member.name: PRIORITY_HINT.IoPriorityHintNormal
member.summary: A normal-priority hint level. This value is the default setting for an I/O operation.

member.name: PRIORITY_HINT.MaximumIoPriorityHintType
member.summary: This value is used for validation. Supported values are less than this value.
